The 2DS is called ‚ÄúNew Nintendo 2DS‚Äù because that‚Äôs what Nintendo named it, it doesn‚Äôt mean your condition of the 2DS is new itself. review.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2020
review.title: I gave this product 5 stars for the service not the product
review.review: When I received this product it looked amazing. The packaging was nice, it arrived quicker than we expected, and the overall presentation of the product was just what we had hoped for. However, it was dead when it arrived so I charged it for a couple of hours and when I turned it on it worked for 30 seconds, then the top screen went black, the bottom went black with and error code coming across the screeen stating to shut off the console and restart or contact nintendo support. I restarted it with the same issue three times and then I messaged the seller to make them aware that I was going to call nintendo to get to the root of the issue. When I was on the call with Nintendo we foudn that this product was not new as advertized and had the wrong programming it was not compatible with that console. I let the seller know what I had found out and they were quick to resolve the issue and apoligized perfusely for the mistake. I do not fault them for this we are all human everyone makes mistakes. We are just happy we were able to return the product without any issues and that everyone on all sides of this were extremely helpful including JMS Holdings, Nintendo Support, and Amazon Customer Service. We purchased a nintendo switch from Best Buy uptown after we received our refund from this product. I do not wish for anyone to avoid buying from this seller they werewonderful when it came down to having an issue with a product...I only wish to inform or remind those purchasing electronics to always charge the product and to try it out upon recieving it so if there is an issue theres no question as to what party is responsible only to how to get it resolved without conflict. Very thankful for all customer service representatives especially during the holidays.
product.title: New Nintendo 2DS XL - Pikachu Edition
